languages.text: "Интересная формулировка — "вынужден". Что вас вынуждает, Соломон? Пустопорожнее любопытство или сдающие нервы? Вас не красит ни то, ни другое".

traits.locale_text: "Интересная формулировка — "вынужден". Что вас вынуждает, Соломон? Пустопорожнее любопытство или сдающие нервы? Вас не красит ни то, ни другое".

languages.text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."
languages.original_text: "Интересная формулировка — "вынужден". Что вас вынуждает, Соломон? Пустопорожнее любопытство или сдающие нервы? Вас не красит ни то, ни другое".

traits.locale_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither of those suits you."
"An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither of those suits you."
"An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."
"An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."
"An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."
"An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

languages.text: 「興味深い言い回しだね。『尋ねざるをえない』？何があなたをそうさせている？ソロモーン。ただの好奇心？情緒不安定？どちらも、あなたらしくないね」
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: 「興味深い言い回しだね。『尋ねざるをえない』？何があなたをそうさせている？ソロモーン。ただの好奇心？情緒不安定？どちらも、あなたらしくないね」

languages.text: "Interessant formuliert. Gezwungen, sagt Ihr? Was zwingt Euch, Solomorne? Ist es bloße Neugier oder emotionale Unsicherheit? Beides steht Euch nicht."
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant formuliert. Gezwungen, sagt Ihr? Was zwingt Euch, Solomorne? Ist es bloße Neugier oder emotionale Unsicherheit? Beides steht Euch nicht."

languages.text: « Vous avez une façon intéressante de vous exprimer. Qu'est-ce qui peut bien vous obliger à me poser cette question, Solomorne ? Est-ce simplement de la curiosité ou de l'insécurité émotionnelle ? Aucune de ces raisons ne serait digne de vous. »
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez une façon intéressante de vous exprimer. Qu'est-ce qui peut bien vous obliger à me poser cette question, Solomorne ? Est-ce simplement de la curiosité ou de l'insécurité émotionnelle ? Aucune de ces raisons ne serait digne de vous. »

languages.text: «Es un modo interesante de plantearlo. ¿Obligación, dice? ¿Se puede saber qué le obliga, Solomorne? ¿Curiosidad morbosa o inseguridad emocional? Ninguna de las dos es digna de usted».
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: «Es un modo interesante de plantearlo. ¿Obligación, dice? ¿Se puede saber qué le obliga, Solomorne? ¿Curiosidad morbosa o inseguridad emocional? Ninguna de las dos es digna de usted».

languages.text: “这个说法还真是有趣。你说你‘不得不’问我，是吗？那是什么迫使你‘不得不’这么做呢？是你无聊的好奇心？还是情感方面的不安全感？这两者都不适合你。”
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: “这个说法还真是有趣。你说你‘不得不’问我，是吗？那是什么迫使你‘不得不’这么做呢？是你无聊的好奇心？还是情感方面的不安全感？这两者都不适合你。”

languages.text: "İlginç. İçinde kalacak olan nedir Solomorne? Sırf meraktan mı, yoksa duygusal boşluktan mı soruyorsun? Sana ikisini de yakıştıramadım."
languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."

traits.locale_text: "İlginç. Ne içinde kalacak Solomorne? Sırf meraktan mı, yoksa duygusal boşluktan mı? Sana ikisini de yakıştıramadım."

languages.original_text: "An interesting way to put it. Forced, you say? What is forcing you, Solomorne? Is it idle curiosity or emotional insecurity? Neither suits you."
